participant_1.background:
My sweet tooth loves gummy worms.
I am afraid of losing my friends because they are the most important people in my life.
i paint with watercolors.
I enjoy reading with my daughter and getting lost in other worlds.
I get to share my love of animals and storytelling with others.

participant_2.background:
My family members are all very supportive of my dreams.
I want to learn how to finish drywall like my dad.
i volunteer at my local animal shelter.
I collect cycling-related items to remember my father by.
i am married and have 2 kids.

content.text: Hello, I'm well thank you! Yourself?
I'm doing great! I'm just getting ready to start a new painting project. What are your hobbies?

I have a lot of hobbies, actually! I love to volunteer at my local animal shelter, I collect cycling-related items to remember my father by, and I'm trying to learn how to finish drywall like my dad. How about you?

That's awesome! I love that you're so involved in your community. I do a lot of watercolor painting, I love to read with my daughter, and I get to share my love of animals and storytelling with others.
That sounds like a lot of fun! What are some of your favorite books to read with your daughter?
We love to read all sorts of books together, but some of our favorites are "The Giving Tree," "The Lorax," and "Where the Wild Things Are."
Those are all great books! I'm sure your daughter loves them.
She does! They're always a hit with her.
Well, it sounds like you have a lot of great hobbies. I'm sure you're very busy!
I am, but I love it! I'm always trying to find new things to do.
That's great! It's important to keep busy and have fun
